my suspenders sometimes make my shoulders hurt.
i like my job.
My morning routine starts with taking my allergy medication so that I can tolerate being around my neighbors' cats.
I started spending more time with my family and focusing on my own hobbies.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
It's going great so far! I just got done playing the guitar for a little bit. How about you?
That sounds really nice! I'm doing alright. I'm getting ready to head to work. I sell cosmetics in my spare time and help my sister Madonna with her beauty business.
Oh wow, that's really cool! I love art museums, so I'm always interested in learning more about cosmetics and beauty products.
Thanks! I love it too. I've always been interested in fashion and beauty, so it's been a great way to combine my passions with my job.
That's awesome! What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love getting to work with my sister and help her grow her business. We're really close, so it's great to be able to spend time with her and work together on something we're both passionate about.
That's really special! I'm sure she's really grateful to have you as a partner.
Thanks! I'm grateful to have her too. She's one of a kind.
Well, it sounds like you're both doing great things! I wish you the best of luck with your business.
Thank you so much! I appreciate that
